gyahu.message: Changed the light levels per moment of the day.
Included illumination effects depending on the moment of the day. Monsters individual illumination bug pending.

Implemented darkening and brightening methods, located in Renderer and RendererState. Comment on how to use them in Kronos. Removed the final attribute of LIGHTSEGSHIFT in LightsAndColors. More testing pending.
Commented not working line. In progress of correcting.
Added a bash file for easy running. You must give it permissions ('chmod 775 runner') and call it ('./runner')

Cycle duration now depends on skill level ("difficulty")
Some refactoring for encapsulation and stability.
Added daycycle control implementing state pattern.

diegodi.body:
Se definen días y noches en el juego. Para que este interesante el juego, tendrán que ser periodos
cortos. El mas difícil el juego, mas largas las noches, y mas cortos los días.
diegodi.title: Create day and night cycles(1 events)

diegodi.body:
Agregar un tipo de monstruos, los vampiros. Estos tienen varias características:
• De día, son mas débiles que de noche. Si están afuera, o expuestos a la luz del día, sufren daños
• Al dañar un monstruo o el jugador, se regeneran
• Al dañar un monstruo, lo contaminan. Al morir, el monstruo se puede transformar en un
vampiro (con baja probabilidad, o un demonio necrófago (ghoul, con mas alta probabilidad).
• Los vampiros pueden volar y invocar murciélagos. Cuando estén debiles, tienen la opción de
invocar murciélagos (una diversion), y de transformarse ellos en murciélagos para huir. Los
murciélagos en el juego están representados por el monstruo “lost soul”.
• Los vampiros sufren muy pocos daños con armas normales.
• Los vampiros mantienen su apariencia original, pero tienen una tinta blanca. Se ponen mas y
mas blancos con el tiempo.
• Los vampiros se pueden matar con dos cosas: los palos de madera (en el juego, la moto sierra),
y agua bendita (en el juego, el “plasma gun”). El “plasma gun” se recarga con con los frascos de
agua (medikit chico) del juego. El agua bendita daña a los vampiros y les hace perder velocidad.
diegodi.title: Add vampires to the game(2 events)

diegodi.body:
Agregar un tipo de monstruos, los hombre-lobos. Estos tienen varias características:
• De dia, se comportan como monstruos normales
• De noche, se transforman en hombre-lobos. Según la fase de la luna, estan mas o menos
poderosos, siendo el mas poderoso cuando la luna esta llena.
• Los hombre-lobos corren muy rapido, y su mordedura hace daño 
• Tal como los vampiros, una herida de hombre-lobo puede contaminar al herido.
• Estan también resistente a los daños de armas normales, aunque menos que los vampiros.
• De noche, los hombre-lobos se parecen al monstruo “demonio”, pero con una tinta negra. Se
ponen mas y mas negros con el tiempo. De día, tienen su apariencia original.
• Los hombre lobo se pueden matar con plata. El jugador tiene como opción de convertir 10 balas
de pistola en una bala de plata. Esto le toma un tiempo por hacer. Tirar una bala de plata es un
disparo secundario de la pistola. El puño del jugador tiene también plata.
diegodi.title: Add werewolves to the game(2 events)

diegodi.title: Respawn monster when killed(2 events)

gyahu.body: Music is Changed through the .WAD. Considering it was a personal goal of the team, rather than a requirement, its been cancelled.

Zerlink.body: Inside the statusbar package, in the StatusBar class there are a lot of variables defining the cheat codes. These are sequences of numbers (possibly referencing to the buttons of the keyboard that have to be pressed for activating the cheatcode). Search for "behold" on the code.

default.body: Should we close the issue? the power of the monster is not controlled by the class.

cdotte.body: Changed all features of plasmagun to behave a like holy water weapon

- MF estan definidos en: gamelogic/mobj_t.java
- Acciones del tipo A_something estan en: gamelogic/ActionFunction.java (class A_FirePlasma)
- MT estan definidos en: data/info.java (MT_PLASMA {la bala del plasmagun})
  -MT_MISC28 coresponde a: "PlasmaGun"(?)

diegodi.body: Logic behind cheatcodes has been implemented, however, due to the way the game manages everything as a _mobj_ type, it was not possible to change the attributes of the player because of a conflict between the player object and the monster object.
Ghouls regenerate hp when attacking other monsters, however, they don't eat corpses to regenerate health.
Change of sprite during times of day has been added, strength change was not added.
Class has been implemented, however, just like with the vampire class, damage by daylight (or immunity in this case) was not added.
Refactoring was not possible due to time constraints, many of the interactions of special monsters with the player and with special weapons are implemented here.
Weakness to holy water added. Damage by sunlight could not be implemented.
Fixed, vampires look like normal monsters but will summon bats to show they are vampires.
Health regeneration and bat summoning done.
Logic of silver bullets has been implemented, visualization in-game not yet.
Correct, power of monsters isn't controlled by this class.
Use these methods for the implementation of the specific monster details
Only werewolves need time parameter, they get stronger the longer they're alive. Newborns start weak.
Add inmunity parameter for daylight damage and silver bullet damage.

Add logic so that ghoul can eat dead monsters to regenerate health.
Add resistance to regular weapons, but less than vampire.

Change appearance of werewolf during day to normal monster appearance.
Include strength change according to moon phase.

Include weakness parameter for holy water.
Include damage when exposed to daylight.
Include hp regeneration parameter.
Summon bats when weak, not only when dying
Moon phases have been implemented and the speed of monsters is affected by it, but the power is still the same on all moon phases.
Contamination has been divided into 4 possible states: clean, vampire, werewolf, hybrid. This contamination state is represented with 2 bits. The parameters are included in the new "monster_t" class.
New subclass created: "monster_t". This class extends mobj_t and contains the resistance parameter to normal weapons.
